# Introduction

Maxmind `GeoIP2 ASN` database.

Database is updated automatically every 4 hours during the process runtime.

## Install

```sh
npm install @c0rejs/geoip-asn
```

## Usage

```javascript
import geiipAsn from "@c0rejs/geoip-asn";

const res = geiipAsn.get( ipAddress );
```
